channel.title: Pwnifiedscape progress
channel.description:
My partner and I have been working on new updates for the server, to give it a fresh new look, with organization. Ready to hold 300+ members and completely transferring the pimpscape base that was used so long ago, into a fresh source most skills written from scratch and the pk system written from scratch with correct java conventions, and doing away with "if" statements..
Here is a small preview...
First is the client... We have seen non renamed clients before with the same old maps and sprites.. My partner and I turned that around completely with perfect working draining stats and the custom msn icon, that shows the amount of players on the server...
[IMG]http://i198.photobucket.com/albums/aa32/pwnifiedj/pwnitest4.jpg[/img]
Note that this is just a debuged server for us to test with, this is not how it looks with the debug codes on the reg server lol
Crucial npc updates, instead of the same old overhead talking to guide you where to go...
[URL=http://s198.photobucket.com/albums/aa32/pwnifiedj/?action=view&current=pwni0002.flv][IMG]http://i198.photobucket.com/albums/aa32/pwnifiedj/th_pwni0002.jpg[/img][/URL]
Arguably perfect dds specing, and all other weapons have working specs...
[URL=http://s198.photobucket.com/albums/aa32/pwnifiedj/?action=view&current=pwni0003.flv][IMG]http://i198.photobucket.com/albums/aa32/pwnifiedj/th_pwni0003.jpg[/img][/URL]
Fully working fletching all scripted from scratch..
[URL=http://s198.photobucket.com/albums/aa32/pwnifiedj/?action=view&current=pwni0008.flv][IMG]http://i198.photobucket.com/albums/aa32/pwnifiedj/th_pwni0008.jpg[/img][/URL]
Last but not least a unique warning system that limits moderators powers, from abusing, with the warn system they can be warned 5 times after 5 there automatically banned.
[IMG]http://i198.photobucket.com/albums/aa32/pwnifiedj/pwniwarn-1.jpg[/img]
Still much more updates to come
-fully working prayer 0% -fully working duel arena 0% -fully working castle wars 0%
and note since my partner and I do not leech scripts those will written from scratch...
:)

item.title: Pwnifiedscape progress
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

This looks awsome, and you haven’t even shown much of it. GL and GJ man

Read full topic

item.title: Pwnifiedscape progress
item.dc:creator: @bhpkyeah satesql
item.description:
@bhpkyeah wrote:

Idk, depends how the update goes, and how many people I can suck into playing my server… If I’m still getting 60-70 players, I’ll probably shut down the server for good… It’s been up for a year now lol, so I want to see if I can get 300+ without using a deltascape base haha…

Read full topic

Watch the vid moron, there is npc dialogue…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 02, 2008, 12:43:41 pm[/size][hr][quote=“kihomura, post:8, topic:247783”]The only thing I don’t like is the sideicons being a bit ‘off’, but that’s easy to fix :P[/quote]

Yeah I got sick of messing with it tbh, I worked on it for a week and trust me it’s harder than people think adding those mini icons…

item.title: Pwnifiedscape progress

item.description:
@bhpkyeah wrote:

My partner and I have been working on new updates for the server, to give it a fresh new look, with organization. Ready to hold 300+ members and completely transferring the pimpscape base that was used so long ago, into a fresh source most skills written from scratch and the pk system written from scratch with correct java conventions, and doing away with “if” statements…

Here is a small preview…

First is the client… We have seen non renamed clients before with the same old maps and sprites… My partner and I turned that around completely with perfect working draining stats and the custom msn icon, that shows the amount of players on the server…

pwnitest4.jpg774×525

Note that this is just a debuged server for us to test with, this is not how it looks with the debug codes on the reg server lol

Crucial npc updates, instead of the same old overhead talking to guide you where to go…

Arguably perfect dds specing, and all other weapons have working specs…

Fully working fletching all scripted from scratch…

Last but not least a unique warning system that limits moderators powers, from abusing, with the warn system they can be warned 5 times after 5 there automatically banned.

pwniwarn-1.jpg773×510

Still much more updates to come

-fully working prayer 0%
